1.desc: Electromagnetic jamming has been detected in this area. If you enter it, your navigation system’s display may be affected. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
1.name: Electromagnetic Anomaly

2.desc: There is a huge whirlpool in this zone. Attempts to move your fleet within this zone may result in failure.
2.name: Maelstrom

3.desc: The waters in this zone are ablaze. If you enter this zone, your ships will take continuous burning damage after each action. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
3.name: Burning Seas

4.desc: Periodic electromagnetic pulses have been detected in this area. Being affected by them will disrupt the navigation system, resulting in your fleet being unable to move accurately.
4.name: Type I EMP

5.desc: Periodic electromagnetic pulses have been detected in this area. Being affected by them will disrupt the navigation system, resulting in decreased movement range.
5.name: Type II EMP

6.desc: The temperature in this zone is extremely low, and your fleet’s equipment will begin to freeze over due to sheer cold, resulting in lowered combat capabilities. This anomaly will persist for several actions.
6.name: Frigid Waters
